Package payrollObjects

Class Management

java.lang.Object
payrollObjects.Employee
payrollObjects.Fulltime
payrollObjects.Management
public class Management
extends Fulltime
Extends the Fulltime class and includes specific data and operations to a full-time employee with a management role. Managers recieve compensation on top of their annual salary depending on their management title.
Author:
Matthew Brandao, Armit Patel

  • Constructor Details

    • Management

      public Management​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String department, Date dateHired, double annualSalary, int manageRole)
      Creates an instance of Management. Management is also an instance of Fulltime. A manager has all the attributes of a full time employee along with a bonus compensation.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the manager
      department - department the manager belongs to
      dateHired - the date the manager was hired
      annualSalary - the amount of the manager's annual salary
      manageRole - the role ID of the manager

  • Method Details

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Compares the profile of two managers.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Fulltime
      Returns:
      true if the full managers share the same profile, false if the profiles are different or the parameter is not an instance of Management

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Creates string representation of a manager's attributes with their manager compensation. A manager's attributes also contains a full time employee's attributes.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Fulltime
      Returns:
      string string representation of an managers's attributes

    • calculatePayment

      public void calculatePayment()
      Calculates the payment for a manager employee.
      Overrides:
      calculatePayment in class Fulltime

    • compensate

      private void compensate​(int manageRole)
      Assigns the appropriate compensation amount to the manager based on the manager's role.
      Parameters:
      manageRole - the ID of the manager role

    • getCompensation

      public double getCompensation()
      Returns the compensation a manager is to receive annually.
      Returns:
      the annual compensation
